market_mood: A cosmic rollercoaster, where ambition battles confusion.
astro_justification: With the Sun in Scorpio fueling deep insights, but the Moon squaring retrograde Mercury, expect mixed signals and some fiery ambitions tempered with miscommunication.

BTC.reason: Confusion reigns as traders grapple with mixed signals in the Scorpio depths.

ETH.reason: Ambitious moves supported by Sun trine Jupiter, but watch out for sudden shifts.

ALTS.reason: Many altcoins are feeling the brunt of the retrograde chaos, leading to a more cautious approach.

quote: When the stars throw a party, bring your patience and a good shield.
